definitions.text: dispose or incline or entice to
examples: We were tempted by the delicious-looking food

definitions.text: provoke someone to do something through (often false or exaggerated) promises or persuasion
give rise to a desire by being attractive or inviting
examples: the window displays tempted the shoppers

definitions.text: induce into action by using one's charm
examples: She charmed him into giving her all his money
St. Anthony was tempted in the desert
